extendedInfo.description: Funktioniert jetzt auch mit Android 4.2 (Jelly Bean)!Screen Timeout Toggle ist eine praktische App, um den Bildschirm eingeschaltet zu lassen, selbst wenn fÃ¼r eine lÃ¤ngere Zeit nicht mit dem GerÃ¤t interagiert wird. Wird die App gestartet, so wird das System daran gehindert das Display automatisch auszuschalten. Gleichzeitig erscheint eine Benachrichtigung in der Statusleiste, die Ã¼ber den aktuellen Status der App informiert und zusÃ¤tzlich eine schnelle MÃ¶glichkeit bietet, das Display-Timeout wieder zu aktivieren. Auf Wunsch kann diese Benachrichtigung deaktiviert werden, dazu ist ein zusÃ¤tzlicher App-Starter vorhanden um die Einstellungen vorzunehmen.FÃ¼r den schnellen Zugriff auf die Funktion ist zudem ein Widget vorhanden, das den derzeitigen Status anzeigt und diesen mit nur einem Klick verÃ¤ndert.Ebenfalls eine gute LÃ¶sung fÃ¼r das Samsung Galaxy S3, welches es selbst nicht ermÃ¶glicht, dass das Display auch bei InaktivitÃ¤t eingeschaltet bleibt.Wenn Ihr Probleme findet, kontaktiert mich bitte per eMail. Ich werde dann die App verbessern, das hilft euch und mir mehr als negative Kommentare!Hinweis: Die neue App verÃ¤ndert nicht mehr den in den Systemeinstellungen eingestellten Wert fÃ¼r das Display-Timeout!

reviews.title: You finally got it right!
reviews.comment: After three or perhaps more updates in four or five days, the developer \"seems\" to have gotten it right. I will continue to search for another option because you should have gotten it right the first time and, who knows when you\'ll reenact your latest debacle.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: used to be 6 stars
reviews.comment: but 0 stars after update. I WANT TOGGLE, NOT OPEN IN BACKGROUND AND WHEN IT CLOSES, NORMAL TIMEOUT COMES BACK!!! I WANT THE PREVIOUS VERSION AND IT\'S A LOT BETTER AND USEFUL.
reviews.author: Bryan Meto

reviews.title: Screen timeout
reviews.comment: great application! I use it all the time. I wish you hadn\'t changed the icon representation for enabled and disabled. i used to be able to tell at a glance whether it was disabled or enabled.
reviews.author: Rick Sandler

reviews.title: It just quit working
reviews.comment: My Droid Maxx now just shows a screen that says notification enabled tho it isn\'t
reviews.author: Richard Ameigh

reviews.title: Exactly what is missing
reviews.comment: I was surprised I could not find any setting on my Samsung  S3 mini to temporarily disable the screen timeout. This app does it perfectly. I give 4 stars for now only because I would find very handy to have the notification area icon always available, not only when screen will stay on.
reviews.author: Luca Borrione

reviews.title: Holy shite
reviews.comment: An app that only has the permission it needs....why cant you guys make everything
reviews.author: James Dugger

reviews.title: A Very Useful App
reviews.comment: After a bit of what seemed a backward step, this app is back up where it was - right up there at the top with the rare few other simple and useful apps. I personally rather like the little notification bar icon letting you know it\'s active (which can obviously be cleared if preferred). I would have preferred the app to have changed the value in the settings as it did in 1.4, but it\'s not a show-stopper that it now doesn\'t and the dev does specifically make clear it no longer does this. Nice work dev and thanks for being so responsive to your grateful users suggestions.
reviews.author: Anthony Stanbridge

reviews.title: Thank you!
reviews.comment: Its so nice to be able to keep the screen on with one touch. Works perfect
reviews.author: Heather Onder

reviews.title: Awesome \\m/
reviews.comment: Really hat\'s off to developers .. Great job guys .  Works flowlessly . Voila
reviews.author: Shylesh Mohan

reviews.title: hummmm
reviews.comment: last update lock my Samsung note2 to close screen after 10 min.  wish i have more option
reviews.author: Tony Kao

reviews.title: timeout while plugged in
reviews.comment: Works great!     A setting where the screen automatically stays on while plugged in would be useful.
reviews.author: Ryan Westgate

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Simple and smart. Thank you!
reviews.author: Dmitri Edwards

reviews.title: works when it wants to
reviews.comment: it barely works on my phone. it still turns the screen off after 1 minute...
reviews.author: Brandon Jaeger

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Works just how I like it
reviews.author: Alexander Martinez

reviews.comment: Loved this and used for some time, but it no longer works. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Nom Deplume

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: It does what it says.
reviews.author: nicky opet

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: This app is almost perfect If you could add a second toggle that allows for a third timing. So if you hit once the screen stays on for 30 seconds, twice for 3 minutes and the third time for never.
reviews.author: Kerry Barbato

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: nice simple app works well and does the job! Excellent!

reviews.title: Flawless
reviews.comment: Absolutely great, wonderful job!

reviews.comment: This is cool
